detaileddescription.para: GEMM operations fused with activations (ReLU, GELU, SiLU) and SwiGLU. The key benefit: intermediate results stay in registers, avoiding DRAM round-trips between operations.

Supported operations:
gemm_bias_relu_fused: C = ReLU(A @ B^T + bias)
gemm_bias_gelu_fused: C = GELU(A @ B^T + bias)
gemm_bias_silu_fused: C = SiLU(A @ B^T + bias)
gemm_swiglu_fused: C = SiLU(x @ W_gate) * (x @ W_up)

All kernels support:
AVX1 SIMD (256-bit vectors, no FMA)
OpenMP parallelization
Scalar fallback

memberdef.argsstring: (const float *A, const float *B, const float *bias, float *C, int M, int N, int K)
memberdef.name: gemm_bias_gelu_fused

memberdef.argsstring: (const float *A, const float *B, const float *bias, float *C, int M, int N, int K)
memberdef.name: gemm_bias_relu_fused

memberdef.argsstring: (const float *A, const float *B, const float *bias, float *C, int M, int N, int K)
memberdef.name: gemm_bias_silu_fused

memberdef.argsstring: (const float *x, const float *W_gate, const float *W_up, const float *b_gate, const float *b_up, float *output, int M, int N, int K)
memberdef.name: gemm_swiglu_fused
